definition: anti-aircraft fire/to shoot at enemy planes

sentences.english: MV, LV Swgr & Distribution Transformers for Phases 1 & 2 and Indoor Lighting of Beijing Shooting Range Hall.
sentences.chinese: 北京射击馆的的配电系统和室内照明的定单。

sentences.english: In fact, this tour is the classic red and white hand-shooting game machine small bees.
sentences.chinese: 其实这款手游就是经典红白机射击游戏小蜜蜂。

sentences.english: A man ran up to President Garfield, pulled out a gun, and fired twice.
sentences.chinese: 一名男子奔向加菲尔德总统，拿出一支枪射击了两次。
兵士们扳起火枪的枪栓准备射击。

sentences.english: Riflemen at the embankment also had cut holes through which they could aim and fire.
sentences.chinese: 堤岸上来复枪手开好了瞄准射击的射孔。

sentences.english: A dramatic example would be shooting LCD screens.
sentences.chinese: 一个戏剧性的例子是射击液晶屏幕。

sentences.english: I shot at the rabbit, but missed it.
sentences.chinese: 我向那只兔子射击，但射飞了。

sentences.english: Wow, the Chinese shooting team was so strong. And what was the mishap?
sentences.chinese: 中国射击队实力很强啊。那后来出了什么意外？

sentences.english: Police said Sunday that the death toll in the shooting rose to 86.
sentences.chinese: 警方周日公布射击死亡人数达到了86人。

sentences.english: The targets vary from fixed target, running game target to flying target.
sentences.chinese: 双向飞碟或飞靶射击中使用的靶子。

sentences.english: I ran to a hole in the wall and looked through .
sentences.chinese: 我跑到一个射击孔前向外张望。
近卫军火枪手能持续射击了。

sentences.english: High cost tower with small shooting range.
The more carried ammunition, the longer to fire.
sentences.chinese: 弹药携行量越大，最大可射击时间越长。

sentences.english: Running target and clay-pigeon shooter shall shoot at standing position with both hands holding the gun.
sentences.chinese: 移动靶和飞碟射手采用立姿双手持枪进行射击。

sentences.english: Medium cost tower with small constant shooting range.
sentences.chinese: 中等成本塔与小常数射击场。

definition: to rake with machine gunfire/to strafe/to machine-gun down
to throw an explosive charge/to bomb
to open fire/to shoot a gun
